data.title: Seibu company profile
data.meta_description: In 2022 the revenue of Seibu grew by 8%, after peaking in 2018. The company engages in the sector 'Transportation & Storage'.
data.text:
All companiesSeibu

Seibu

Seibu was founded in 2006 and operates in Toshima, Japan. The company engages in the sector 'Transportation & Storage' (ISIC: H). The industry includes the provision of passenger or freight transport, whether scheduled or not, by rail, pipeline, road, water or air and associated activities such as terminal and parking facilities, cargo handling, storage, etc. Included in the transportation & storage industry is the renting of transport equipment with a driver or operator. Also included are postal and courier activities.
